data.eml:eml: Systematics, morphology and ecology of rails (Aves: Rallidae) of the Mascarene Islands, with one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hume, Julian Pender (2019): Systematics, morphology and ecology of rails (Aves: Rallidae) of the Mascarene Islands, with one new species. Zootaxa 4626 (1): 1-107, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4626.1.1
